metadata.title: CVE-2012-2666 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
golang/go in 1.0.2 fixes all.bash on shared machines. dotest() insrc/pkg/debug/gosym/pclntab_test.go creates a temporary file withpredicable name and executes it as shell script.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2666` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.0.2
golang-1.13-go - 1.0.2
golang-1.13-src - 1.0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2').
